subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets signed the right-handed reliever Guillermo Mota to a two-year, $5 million contract on Thursday. Mota will miss the first 50 games of the 2007 season for violating baseball’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: The Mets signed the right-handed reliever Guillermo Mota to a two-year, $5 million contract on Thursday. Mota will miss the first 50 games of the 2007 season for violating baseball’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs.
